param.name: fbConf_wysiwyg_label
param.label: Use WYSIWYG editor for element labels

param.name: fbConf_alter_existing_db_cols
param.label: Alter field types
param.description: If no selected then fabrik will not alter database table field types, when saving elements. If yes selected then fabrik will update your database table structure to assure maximum compatibility

param.name: remove_tables_on_unistall
param.label: Remove tables on uninstall
param.description: drop tables that contain data collected by fabrik when unistalling fabrik

param.name: usefabrik_mootools
param.label: Use fabrik version of mootools
param.description: If yes selected then fabrik will attempt to replace Joomla's version of mootools with the latest mootools version - note this may stop other modules from working on fabrik pages
